di.es.ayi. supar spots pasal wolibol tharagawaliye awasan tharaga me masa 27 ha 28 dinawala nawalapitiya jayathilaka kridanganayedi pawathwe.me awasan tharaga watayata basnahira palathe kisidu pasalak sudusukam nolabu athara pitapalath kandayam sudusukam laba thibe.uthuru-nagenahira athulu sama pradeshayakinma pasal wolibol kandayam sahabhagiwu dawanthama tharagawaliya wana meya disthrik, palath ha jathika mattamen pawathwe. 14 wani warata sanwidhanaya wu mewara tharagawaliyata kandayam 5500k sahabhagi wima wisheshathwayaki.awasan tharaga watayedi 12n pahala ha 14n pahala balika isawwalata anuradhapura puwarasankulama maha widyalaya sudusukam labima kapi pene.

kese wethath gadafi idis ju rajuwa nerapa dama mita wasara 42kata pera libiyawe palanaya siyathata ganna wita rata aarthika athin durwala mattamaka pawathuni.eheth krama kramayen libiyawa thibunu thathwayen mudawa rata nisimagakata gena eemata gadafige palanaya samath wiya.me sandaha gadafi thama rata sathu thel sampatha yoda gaththeya.thel balaya upayogi kara ganimin gadafi loka deshapalanaya thulada sellam damimata patan gaththeya.batahira wirodi aakalpayaka sitimin batahira lokaya dadiwa wiwechanaya kirima gadafige maranaya thawath ikman kala bawa nam norahasaki.kese wethath rata thula samajawadi deshapalana ratawakata genayamata katayuthu kala gadafi asuwa dashakayedi sanskruthika wiplawayak yayi kiyamain siyalu paudgalika wyapara thahanam kirimath katha kirime nidahasa saha raswime nidahasa sima kirimath,wideshagathawa sitityada thama wirudda wadingen paliganimata katayuthu kirima wani karana mul karagena janathawa thula mohu kere aprasadaya dinen dina wardanaya wannata wiya.balayen mathwa katayuthu kirima thula eekadipathithwaye lakshana gadafi thulin thawathawath pennum karannata wima thula rate janathawa mahath pidawen siti bawa gadafige maranaya wu aakaraya hondin pahadili kara deyi.
